column1: The '''Muster of Edoras''' were the [[Rohirrim]] that could be mustered to war from [[Edoras]] and the King's Lands
column2: including those from [[Harrowdale]] in the [[White Mountains]]. By tradition
column3: the Muster of Edoras was under the command of the [[First Marshal of the Riddermark]]. At the time of the [[War of the Ring]]
column5: partly through the schemes of [[Saruman]] and [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]]. Though there was no First Marshal
column6: the Muster did have a leader in [[Elfhelm]]
column7: though he did not at that time carry the title of Marshal.
